name: Latchel
headline: 24/7 emergency maintenance department for property managers and√¢¬Ä¬¶
description: Latchel is the only end-to-end platform that automates maintenance coordination and delivers best in class resident amenities. We service over 80,000 homes across over 400 customers in all 50 states of the US. We√¢¬Ä¬ôre growing rapidly and need a Product Designer to continue our rapid growth trajectory.

founders.name: Ethan Lieber, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Latchel. Previously, Director of Product at OPO where I managed lead gen products for home services.

The First Resident Experience Platform for Maintenance
# Make Repairs a Peak Resident Experience
Transform your maintenance process into a resident-first experience that boosts owner retention and fuels business growth. Whether fixing 30% of issues up front, leaving a 5-Star review, or getting an immediate response to a phone call, your residents will be smiling the whole way through.
[ Get a Demo ](http://latchel.com/</demo-request/>)
[ ![property-management-maintenance-software](https://latchel.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Homepage_Hero.png) ](http://latchel.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjExODkyIiwidG9nZ2xlIjpmYWxzZX0%3D>)
## How Latchel Helps
![Maintenance-Efficiency](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20755'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Maintenance Efficiency
Shield your team from the 24/7 barrage of maintenance while automating the tedious tasks that suck up your time.
![Revenue-Generation](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20755'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Revenue Generation
Generate more revenues for every door you manage while protecting you and your owners from accidental repair costs.
![no-cost-partnership](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20755'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## No Cost Partnership
Improve your margins and turn a traditional cost into revenue by leveraging Latchel‚Äôs flexible partnership with zero cost to you.
## Put Your Residents First
## Generate 5-Star Reviews
Residents talk to a real person in just 15 seconds, fix up to 30% of issues on the phone, and get regular follow-ups from Latchel‚Äôs AI creating more 5-Star reviews on [Google](http://latchel.com/<https:/www.google.com/maps/place/Latchel/@47.608715,-122.3397979,11z/data=!4m8!3m7!1s0x808fbb5ed1ed138b:0xa9dfc00150f9c11!8m2!3d47.608715!4d-122.339798!9m1!1b1!16s%2Fg%2F11g__4jhhd?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDIwNS4xIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D>).
## Solve Problems Fast
You get a real-time view of job progress along with automated alerts when repairs get stuck. Chat directly with Latchel‚Äôs maintenance experts so that solving problems for residents is fast and easy.
## Increase Resident Value
Give your residents access to $2,700 in credits for accidental damages, housekeeping, and chargeback reimbursements, transforming painful fee conversations into **wow moments**.
![Home](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![fix-maintenance-issues-up-front](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201380%201572'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![fix-maintenance-issues-up-front](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20911'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Use Maintenance As A Retention Tool 
## Better Resident Retention Starts with Maintenance
Poorly handled maintenance is the top reason residents attrit. On top of that, resident attrition is the number one blocker to better NOI.
That‚Äôs why Latchel‚Äôs workflows put residents first ‚Äì scheduling work based on resident availability, sending preventative supplies to reduce dispatching, and even providing residents with credits for housekeeping.
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/emergency-maintenance-support/>)
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/emergency-maintenance-support/>)
## Turn Maintenance Into Ancillary Revenue
## Turn Maintenance Into Ancillary Revenue
Combine a world class maintenance experience with Latchel‚Äôs resident benefit to transform a traditional cost into ancillary revenue. Home Assistant foots the bill for resident-caused damage saving your residents an average of $600/year.
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/ancillary-revenues/>)
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/ancillary-revenues/>)
![add-ancillary-revenues](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20900%20861'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![accidental-damage-reimbursement](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20966'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![accidental-damage-reimbursement](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20755'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Financial Protection for You and Residents
## Financial Protection for You and Residents
Latchel foots the bill for resident-caused damage, preventing uncomfortable conversations with residents and owners all while protecting your assets.
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/ancillary-revenues/>)
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/ancillary-revenues/>)
## No budget? No problem.
## Tight budget? No problem.
Our mission is to help you deliver an incredible resident experience without sacrificing your bottom line. Combine Latchel‚Äôs maintenance experience platform with our resident benefits, and pay for 100% of the software through the ancillary revenues that you generate, no out-of-pocket cost.
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/budget-approval-automation/>)
[ Learn More ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/budget-approval-automation/>)
![revenue-generation-property-management](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20966'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Results that Speak for Themselves
![latchel-maintenance-statistics](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20300'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![latchel-maintenance-statistics](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20300'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![latchel-maintenance-statistics](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20300'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![latchel-maintenance-statistics](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20300'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![johnny-wolff-ceo-homeroom](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%201018'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
I think we might have the best solution in property management in Latchel.  What you don‚Äôt want as a CEO is to be burning time on operations when you‚Äôre driving for sales & revenue. Once we committed to Latchel, it changed the game for us.‚Äù
Johnny Wolff, Homeroom
## Turn maintenance into a 5-Star experience for residents.

Join our exclusive Latchel community of property managers
Get access to the most recent innovations and news in property management. We‚Äôll send high impact, growth focused information on a weekly basis.
Name 
Email 
Submit
![latchel-logo](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2048%2048'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Copyright ¬© 2025 Latchel
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Unlock the Potential of Digital Insurance
###### Launch a tailored renter's insurance program
Sure provides tailored renter‚Äôs insurance that enables property managers, owners, and residents to protect their property, minimize risk, and experience the peace of mind that comes with the protection of your assets and business.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20868'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Most leases require renters insurance. So, we‚Äôve partnered with Sure to provide that option for your residents. While residents aren‚Äôt required to use Sure to meet the renter‚Äôs insurance requirement, this is still a convenient option you can offer to your tenants. 
All services and products are provided by Sure, not Latchel subject to Sure‚Äôs terms and conditions.
[ Schedule Demo ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/resident-benefits-demo-request/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20500%2098'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Property Inspection Platform
###### Automate and Organize Inspections with RentCheck
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Make Inspections Easier** RentCheck saves time by enabling residents to complete inspections on their own. Customization and automation ensure the job gets done. 
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Stop Wasting Time** Schedule inspections for all stages of the lease cycle at any cadence you choose. RentCheck handles the reminders. 
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Instantly Submit Work Orders** Take advantage of Latchel's integration with RentCheck to instantly submit a work order for any maintenance issues that pop up on an inspection.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Modernize Your Process** Easily compare new and existing inspection reports, side-by-side, and avoid security deposit disputes.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Prompt Routine Filter Changes and Resident Tasks** Schedule resident reminders to replace filters and other upkeep tasks over the course of the lease lifecycle.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201480%20614'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
To learn more about RentCheck, talk with a Latchel benefits expert today. All services and products are provided by RentCheck, not Latchel, and subject to RentCheck‚Äôs terms and conditions.
[ Schedule Demo ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/resident-benefits-demo-request/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20500%20100'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Affordable Pest Control
**Access world class pest control for a fraction of the normal price. No need for new software or a complicated setup.**
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Easy Pest Control** Residents simply reach out to Cover Pest if there is a pest issue, and Cover Pest takes it from there.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Clarity on Who Pays the Bill** No more awkward conversations about who is responsible for the bill! With Cover Pest as a resident benefit, residents get pest control for covered pests without an additional cost.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Vendor Sourcing** No more sourcing for vendors! Cover Pest will source and coordinate with vendors for each pest control request
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**To learn more about Cover Pest, talk to a Latchel benefits specialist today. All services and products are provided by Cover Pest, not Latchel, and subject to Cover Pest‚Äôs terms and conditions.**
[ Schedule Demo ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/resident-benefits-demo-request/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20140'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Air Filter Delivery Subscription
FilterTime is an air filter delivery service that makes it easy and convenient for residents to replace their air filters. FilterTime customers can protect their HVAC system, reduce dust and pollen, save money on energy costs, and more by leveraging this delivery service.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Reduce Labor for HVAC Issues** Filter delivery service results in a 38% reduction of total HVAC ticket requests.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Cost Savings on HVAC Repairs** Average HVAC repair costs have increased by 48.7% year over year. an air filter delivery subscription can cut costs up to $250-300 per property per year.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Energy Reduction** Filter delivery is saving residents $14.82 per month in energy costs.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20822'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### How it works:
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Choose from almost every size and type of air filter including custom-made sizes
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Choose how often you want your filters delivered
![smile-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
A box of brand new air filters delivered to your resident‚Äôs front door
**To learn more about FilterTime, talk with a Latchel benefits specialist today. All services and products are provided by FilterTime, not Latchel subject to FilterTime‚Äôs terms and conditions.**
[ Schedule Demo ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/resident-benefits-demo-request/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20696%20233'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Boost resident satisfaction and drive good resident behavior through a rewards, incentives, and credit building program
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Drive On-Time Rent Payments** Pi√±ata rewards renters for on-time rent payments through Pi√±ata cash, and boosts renter's credit scores for online payments.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Boost Resident Satisfaction** $30 gift card to use at select brands and businesses, $25 restaurant card, 720 annual Pi√±ata Cash to use on rewards, Early lease renewal gift.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Attract and Retain Renters** 2 out of 3 renters prefer properties with rent reporting. Plus, residents get incentives for early lease renewals.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Rewards Residents Love** Residents can use Pi√±ata Cash on brands they know and love, such as: Starbucks, Amazon, Sephora, Lego, Target, Walmart, Home Depot, Lowes, Doordash, Best Buy, and many more!
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20762'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Pi√±ata Cash
Residents easily earn Pi√±ata Cash any day of the month by doing things like taking surveys, referring friends, or trying out new products.
Residents also get access to big-ticket giveaways, limited drops and super surges!
And, with exclusive access to our marketplace with over 300,000 deals, residents can squirrel away up to $4,500 annually.
To learn more about Pi√±ata, talk with a member of our benefits team today. All services and products are provided by Pi√±ata, not Latchel subject to Pi√±ata‚Äôs terms and conditions.
[ Schedule Demo ](http://latchel.com/<https:/latchel.com/resident-benefits-demo-request/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Master Liability Insurance
**Now you have one less thing to worry about with a Master Liability Policy through Obie.**
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Affordable Coverage** Affordable policies available with liability coverage starting at $100,000 and up to $300,000 to meet any property manager insurance requirements.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Stay 100% Compliant** Master policy provides $100,000 for management companies and owners by ensuring 100% of occupied homes and units are covered for property damage liability issues relating to resident negligence.
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Peace of Mind** Liability coverages include perils such as fire, smoke, water, explosion, overflow of sewer, and many others that provide coverage for damages you (the resident) may cause to your unit or home
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Personal Liability** Personal liability coverage is automatically include to protect you against claims where you may be considered legally liable. (Bodily injury claims, dog bite claims, and more)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![check-mark-icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%20120'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
**Additional Coverages** Additional/expanded coverages are also available. (Pet damage, identity fraud, theft/vandalism, and more are available!)
**All services and products are provided through Obie and are subject to Obie‚Äôs terms and conditions.**

The First Resident Experience Platform for Maintenance
# Make Repairs a Peak Resident Experience
Transform your maintenance process into a resident-first experience that boosts owner retention and fuels business growth. Whether fixing 30% of issues up front, leaving a 5-Star review, or getting an immediate response to a phone call, your residents will be smiling the whole way through.
 Get a Demo ‚ü®33‚ü©

## How Latchel Helps
![Maintenance-Efficiency‚ü®35‚ü©]
## Maintenance Efficiency
Shield your team from the 24/7 barrage of maintenance while automating the tedious tasks that suck up your time.
![Revenue-Generation‚ü®35‚ü©]
## Revenue Generation
Generate more revenues for every door you manage while protecting you and your owners from accidental repair costs.
![no-cost-partnership‚ü®35‚ü©]
## No Cost Partnership
Improve your margins and turn a traditional cost into revenue by leveraging Latchel‚Äôs flexible partnership with zero cost to you.
## Put Your Residents First
## Generate 5-Star Reviews
Residents talk to a real person in just 15 seconds, fix up to 30% of issues on the phone, and get regular follow-ups from Latchel‚Äôs AI creating more 5-Star reviews on Google‚ü®36‚ü©.
## Solve Problems Fast
You get a real-time view of job progress along with automated alerts when repairs get stuck. Chat directly with Latchel‚Äôs maintenance experts so that solving problems for residents is fast and easy.
## Increase Resident Value
Give your residents access to $2,700 in credits for accidental damages, housekeeping, and chargeback reimbursements, transforming painful fee conversations into **wow moments**.
![Home‚ü®37‚ü©]
![fix-maintenance-issues-up-front‚ü®38‚ü©]
![fix-maintenance-issues-up-front‚ü®39‚ü©]
## Use Maintenance As A Retention Tool 
## Better Resident Retention Starts with Maintenance
Poorly handled maintenance is the top reason residents attrit. On top of that, resident attrition is the number one blocker to better NOI.
That‚Äôs why Latchel‚Äôs workflows put residents first ‚Äì scheduling work based on resident availability, sending preventative supplies to reduce dispatching, and even providing residents with credits for housekeeping.

## Turn Maintenance Into Ancillary Revenue
Combine a world class maintenance experience with Latchel‚Äôs resident benefit to transform a traditional cost into ancillary revenue. Home Assistant foots the bill for resident-caused damage saving your residents an average of $600/year.

generated_description:
Latchel is shaking up the property management scene with a sleek end-to-end platform that's all about resident experience and maintenance automation. Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2019 batch, this Seattle-based company has grown rapidly, now serving over 80,000 homes across the United States. 

At the core of Latchel‚Äôs mission is to deliver a 24/7 emergency maintenance department tailored for property managers. They equip their clients with tools to handle maintenance intake, emergency support, work order tracking, and even invoicing and reporting‚Äîall while ensuring residents receive top-notch amenities and experiences.

Their approach is two-fold: they simplify the management side, reducing time spent on endless coordination, while simultaneously enhancing the resident's interaction with services. With features aimed at boosting resident retention, such as direct communication with maintenance experts and a user-friendly interface, Latchel takes on the burden of property maintenance, allowing property managers to focus on growth instead of firefighting.

Latchel is also keen on turning maintenance costs into ancillary revenue. They achieve this by offering residents credits for damages and care services which improve satisfaction and retention. For those on the lookout for a position, the company is on the hunt for a Product Designer to continue their momentum.

With a dedicated team behind it, and a vision that puts residents at the forefront, Latchel is not just another SaaS company‚Äîit‚Äôs positioning itself as a vital partner for property managers who recognize the importance of a stellar resident experience. For more details, you can check out [Latchel's website](http://latchel.com). 

In a nutshell, Latchel aims to transform routine maintenance into moments that residents love, paving the way for smoother operations and strengthened relationships for property managers.
